entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 8:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
